verses.verse: Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H853>now<s%> thy <S%H1254>Creator<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of thy <S%H979>youth,<s%> <S%H5704>while<s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H3808>not,<s%> nor the <S%H8141>years<s%> draw <S%H5060>nigh,<s%> <S%H834>when<s%> thou shalt <S%H559>say,<s%> I have <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2656>pleasure<s%> in them;

While <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834><s%> the <S%H8121>sun,<s%> or the <S%H216>light,<s%> or the <S%H3394>moon,<s%> or the <S%H3556>stars,<s%> be <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H2821>darkened,<s%> nor the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> the rain: <S%H1653><s%>

In the <S%H3117>day<s%> when the <S%H8104>keepers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> shall <S%H7945>tremble,<s%> <S%H2111><s%> and the <S%H2428>strong<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> shall bow <S%H5791>themselves,<s%> and the <S%H2912>grinders<s%> <S%H988>cease<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> they are <S%H4591>few,<s%> and those that <S%H7200>look<s%> out of the <S%H699>windows<s%> be <S%H2821>darkened,<s%>

And the <S%H1817>doors<s%> shall be <S%H5462>shut<s%> in the <S%H7784>streets,<s%> when the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H2913>grinding<s%> is <S%H8213>low,<s%> and he shall rise <S%H6965>up<s%> at the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of the <S%H6833>bird,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H7892>music<s%> shall be brought <S%H7817>low;<s%>

Also <S%H1571><s%> when they shall be <S%H3372>afraid<s%> of that which is <S%H4480>high,<s%> <S%H1364><s%> and <S%H2849>fears<s%> shall be in the <S%H1870>way,<s%> and the almond <S%H8247>tree<s%> shall <S%H5006>flourish,<s%> and the <S%H2284>grasshopper<s%> shall be a <S%H5445>burden,<s%> and <S%H35>desire<s%> shall <S%H6565>fail:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H1980>goeth<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H5769>long<s%> <S%H1004>home,<s%> and the <S%H5594>mourners<s%> go <S%H5437>about<s%> the streets: <S%H7784><s%>

Or <S%H5704><s%> <S%H834>ever<s%> <S%H3808><s%> the <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H2256>cord<s%> be <S%H7368>loosed,<s%> or the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H1543>bowl<s%> be <S%H7533>broken,<s%> or the <S%H3537>pitcher<s%> be <S%H7665>broken<s%> <S%H5921>at<s%> the <S%H4002>fountain,<s%> or the <S%H1534>wheel<s%> <S%H7533>broken<s%> <S%H413>at<s%> the <S%H953>cistern.<s%>

Then shall the <S%H6083>dust<s%> <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%> as it <S%H7945>was:<s%> <S%H1961><s%> and the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> shall <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> it.

And <S%H3148>moreover,<s%> because the <S%H6953>preacher<s%> <S%H7945>was<s%> <S%H1961><s%> <S%H2450>wise,<s%> he <S%H5750>still<s%> <S%H3925>taught<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge;<s%> yea, he gave good <S%H238>heed,<s%> and sought <S%H2713>out,<s%> and set in <S%H8626>order<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H4912>proverbs.<s%>

The <S%H6953>preacher<s%> <S%H1245>sought<s%> to find <S%H4672>out<s%> <S%H2656>acceptable<s%> <S%H1697>words:<s%> and that which was <S%H3789>written<s%> was <S%H3476>upright,<s%> even <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H571>truth.<s%>

The <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%> are as <S%H1861>goads,<s%> and as <S%H4930>nails<s%> <S%H5193>fastened<s%> by the <S%H1167>masters<s%> of <S%H627>assemblies,<s%> which are <S%H5414>given<s%> from one <S%H4480>shepherd.<s%> <S%H7462><s%> <S%H259><s%>

And <S%H3148>further,<s%> by <S%H4480>these,<s%> <S%H1992><s%> my <S%H1121>son,<s%> be <S%H2094>admonished:<s%> of <S%H6213>making<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H5612>books<s%> there is <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H7093>end;<s%> and <S%H7235>much<s%> <S%H3854>study<s%> is a <S%H3024>weariness<s%> of the <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

Let us <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H5490>conclusion<s%> of the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H1697>matter:<s%> <S%H3372>Fear<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H8104>keep<s%> his <S%H4687>commandments:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> is the <S%H3605>whole<s%> duty of <S%H120>man.<s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H4639>work<s%> into <S%H4941>judgment,<s%> <S%H5921>with<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> secret <S%H5956>thing,<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> it be <S%H2896>good,<s%> or <S%H518>whether<s%> it be <S%H7451>evil.<s%>
